summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue Northeast from East 55th Street to East 58th Street et al in the City of Seattle by laying watermains under Ordinance No. 19417, creating Local Improvement District No. 1857 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
